marathon/libprocess-ip.description: Interface to bind to for communication with the Mesos master.

mesos/master.description: The URL of the Mesos master. The format is a comma-delimited list of hosts like zk://host1:port,host2:port/mesos. If using ZooKeeper, pay particular attention to the leading zk:// and trailing /mesos! If not using ZooKeeper, standard URLs like http://localhost are also acceptable.

marathon/cpus.description: CPU shares to allocate to each Marathon instance.

marathon/mem.description: Memory (MB) to allocate to each Marathon instance.

marathon/instances.description: Number of Marathon instances to run.

marathon/artifact_store.description: URL to the artifact store. Examples: "hdfs://localhost:54310/path/to/store", "file:///var/log/store". For details, see the artifact store docs: https://mesosphere.github.io/marathon/docs/artifact-store.html.

marathon/checkpoint.description: Enable checkpointing of tasks. Requires checkpointing enabled on slaves. Allows tasks to continue running during mesos-slave restarts and Marathon scheduler failover.

marathon/executor.description: Executor to use when none is specified.

marathon/failover-timeout.description: The failover_timeout for Mesos in seconds. If a new Marathon instance has not re-registered with Mesos this long after a failover, Mesos will shut down all running tasks started by Marathon. Requires checkpointing to be enabled.

marathon/framework-name.description: The framework name to register with Mesos.

marathon/ha.description: Runs Marathon in high-availability mode with leader election. Allows starting an arbitrary number of other Marathons but all need to be started in HA mode. This mode requires a running ZooKeeper.

marathon/local-port-max.description: Maximum port number to use when assigning service ports to apps.

marathon/local-port-min.description: Minimum port number to use when assigning service ports to apps.

marathon/reconciliation-initial-delay.description: The delay, in milliseconds, before Marathon begins to periodically perform task reconciliation operations.

marathon/reconciliation-interval.description: The period, in milliseconds, between task reconciliation operations.

marathon/event-subscriber.description: Event subscriber module to enable. Currently the only valid value is "http_callback".

marathon/http-endpoints.description: Pre-configured http callback URLs. Valid only in conjunction with --event_subscriber http_callback. Additional callback URLs may also be set dynamically via the REST API.

marathon/zk.description: ZooKeeper URL for storing state. Format: zk://host1:port1,host2:port2,.../path

marathon/zk-max-versions.description: Limit the number of versions stored for one entity.

marathon/mesos-authentication-principal.description: The Mesos principal used for authentication.

marathon/mesos-authentication-secret-fil.description: The path to the Mesos secret file containing the authentication secret.

marathon/marathon-store-timeout.description: Maximum time in milliseconds, to wait for persistent storage operations to complete.

marathon/http-credentials.description: Credentials for accessing the HTTP service in the format of username:password. The username may not contain a colon (:).

marathon/http-port.description: The port on which to listen for HTTP requests.

marathon/https-port.description: The port on which to listen for HTTPS requests.

marathon/ssl-keystore-password.description: Password for the keystore supplied with the marathon/ssl-keystore-path option.

marathon/ssl-keystore-path.description: Path to the SSL keystore. SSL will be enabled if this option is supplied.
